channel.title: Source Recorder for BM?
channel.description:
There's a couple of things I want to record in game and when it comes to Source games, Source Recorder has always been the best.
For Black Mesa however, the standard H264 method doesn't work and I can only convert recorded footage into an image sequence. That's not too much of a problem considering I can throw those images into Virtual Dub. However, the images are TGAs which will absolutely rape my hard drive space.
Any solutions?

item.title: Source Recorder for BM?
item.dc:creator: _amp_amp_RB_amp_amp
item.description:
I wish I could help you but the only thing I know about is how to record demos and play them back ingame.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Recorder for BM?

There’s a couple of things I want to record in game and when it comes to Source games, Source Recorder has always been the best.

For Black Mesa however, the standard H264 method doesn’t work and I can only convert recorded footage into an image sequence. That’s not too much of a problem considering I can throw those images into Virtual Dub. However, the images are TGAs which will absolutely rape my hard drive space.
